hero.description: I'm passionate about Frontend and Backend development with experience in Javascript, React.js, Angular.js, MySQL, PHP, and Laravel. I specialize in building modern, fast, and scalable digital solutions with a focus on user experience and code quality.

about.description: Frontend and Backend Developer with experience in multiple technologies. Passionate about building efficient and scalable web applications. A self-taught learner committed to continuous improvement and best development practices.

list1: Full web application development (frontend and backend)
Emphasis on performance and user experience
list2: Integration of external APIs and third-party services

items.title: POS Sales System, Bogotá (Freelance Project)
items.description: FullStack sales system with responsive design, built using PHP 8, MySQL, HTML, CSS, jQuery, and Bootstrap. MVC architecture implemented for multi-branch management, user roles, inventory, electronic invoicing (Colombia), reports, and daily cash control. Designed for development and commercialization.

items.title: Ecommerce System, Bogotá (Freelance Project)
items.description: Ecommerce platform in PHP with modular MVC architecture for managing products, users, and orders. Integrated REST API for CRUD operations and an admin panel using AdminLTE 3.2.0. Focused on scalability and clean code organization.

items.title: Document Management System, Bogotá (Freelance Project)
items.description: Document management system in PHP (CodeIgniter 4, MySQL) with scalable MVC architecture for creating, editing, organizing, and advanced file search.

items.title: Online Marketplace System, Bogotá (Freelance Project)
items.description: Marketplace developed in PHP 8 and MySQL with RESTful architecture, payment gateway integration, user registration, chat interface, and multi-vendor support.

items.title: SENA Apprentice, Sistemas EnLinea S.A. Bogotá (Internship)
items.description: Created and developed Angular components and forms, researched and implemented microfrontends, studied and applied User Story Mapping technique, designed and implemented basic prototypes for support screens and Angular libraries.

items.title: Academic High School Diploma, Instituto Tomas Moro, Bogotá
Complete Web Development with HTML5, CSS3, JS AJAX PHP and MySQL, Udemy.
Deep Dive into HTML and CSS, Platzi.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: I specialize in frontend development to create modern and functional websites using technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular, and Laravel. I always aim to deliver optimized and scalable solutions.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: Backend application development using Node.js, ensuring seamless integration with databases and APIs to deliver optimal performance and exceptional user experience.

webapps.title: Web Applications
webapps.description: I build custom web applications with ReactJS, focusing on dynamic, fast, and responsive user experiences.

ecommerce.title: Ecommerce
ecommerce.description: Ecommerce project in PHP with modular MVC architecture for managing products, users, and orders. Includes REST API for CRUD and an admin panel using AdminLTE 3.2.0. Focused on scalability and code organization.

pos.title: Point of Sale (POS) System
pos.description: POS system in PHP (MVC) with multi-branch, roles, inventory management, invoicing (Colombia), reports, and daily cash control. Practical system for development and commercialization.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.description: Marketplace in PHP8/MySQL: RESTful API, payment gateways, user registration, chat interface, and multi-vendor system.

filemanager.title: File Manager
filemanager.description: Document system built in PHP/CodeIgniter 4/MySQL for creating, editing, organizing, and advanced file searching, with scalable MVC architecture.
